description:
Iman Plan are a series of seminars dedicated to increasing our Iman by increasing our understanding of Islam. For those that happen to be busy but still want to learn the basics of Islam in a gradual manner that is conducive to "The New Muslim Experience"

This seminar is titled: "The Keys of Guidance" covering three keys to our faith:

1) The conditions of the "Shahadah" Testimony of faith (Have this hyperlinked to a video on how one becomes muslim page)

2) Purification and Prayer

3) Sanctioned Sources

Upon completing this video seminar and answering the questions posed, New or Revert Muslims will have what is necessary for their process of progression in Islam. Including, but not limited to:

1 ) How to direct key elements of worship to Allah only

2 ) How to prepare for prayer

3 ) Understanding basic history of the compilation of the Quran and Sunnah (life of the Prophet (SAW))

Sign up today and receive your free download the "ImanPlan" book by KnewU founder, Abdullah Oduro.
title: The Iman Plan: Lessons for Convert and Revert Muslims
